name: Dark Dungeon (Caleb Noller)
description:
Dark Dungeon by Caleb Noller

Life is like walking through a dungeon blind. You never truly know what's there until you run into it.

Controls

  • Left click: move
  • Double left click: pick up or inspect an item

References:

Sounds from freesound.org

  • Squeaking Metal Closet Door in Basement by RutgerMuller
  • Item Collect 2 by cameronmusic (edited)
  • Atmospheric Ambience Loop by Sirkoto51

See also:

  • Hello World! The Secret Lives of Shapes by Caleb Noller - Say "hi" in three different ways in this charming and delightful tiny game
  • A Horrifyingly Peaceful Stroll in the Park by Caleb Noller - A li'l survival game that's a walk in the park
